DataElement.preferredName: Exemestane Prevention Study Eligibility Determination Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The criteria to determine eligibility of patients for the exemestane trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A synthetic androgen analogue.  Exemestane binds irreversibly to and inhibits the enzyme aromatase, thereby blocking the conversion of cholesterol to pregnenolone and the peripheral aromatization of androgenic precursors into estrogens. (NCI04)_A type of study protocol designed to evaluate intervention(s) for disease prevention._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A synthetic androgen analogue.  Exemestane binds irreversibly to and inhibits the enzyme aromatase, thereby blocking the conversion of cholesterol to pregnenolone and the peripheral aromatization of androgenic precursors into estrogens. (NCI04)

Concepts.definition: An irreversible steroidal aromatase inhibitor, with antiestrogen and antineoplastic activities. Upon oral administration, exemestane binds irreversibly to and inhibits the enzyme aromatase, thereby blocking the peripheral aromatization of androgens, including androstenedione and testosterone, to estrogens. This lowers estrogen levels in the blood circulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of study protocol designed to evaluate intervention(s) for disease prevention.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A type of study protocol designed to evaluate intervention(s) for disease prevention.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.value: I WISH TO DETERMINE WHETHER I AM ELIGIBLE FOR THE EXEMESTANE TRIAL I HAVE UNDERGONE A BREAST TISSUE BIOPSY FOR DIAGNOSIS OF MY CURRENT BREAST NODULE AND I AGREE TO ALLOW RESEARCHERS TO HAVE ACCESS TO MY BIOPSY TO TEST FOR THE ESTROGEN RECEPTOR
